name: Fu-Shan

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 24%.

skills.name: Howl
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing an extra hit.
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +15%

skills.name: Frightful Claws
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 20% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +15%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Shred
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 4 times at random. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +25%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
